project.description: Run tests for the Tkinter application project and print results

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Change to project directory (set this to your project path inside Jenkins workspace) cd $WORKSPACE/project-directory/ # Replace with actual project directory
# Activate virtual environment (for both UNIX and Windows systems) source ./venv/bin/activate || .\\venv\\Scripts\\activate
# Install dependencies pip install -r requirements.txt
# Run tests and print results to console python -m unittest discover -s tests -v
